Simple Menu Help: This is the simple mode of the folder sorter where you just select a folder and then sort.
Advanced Menu Help:
This will bring you to a nother menu where you can select one of the following options: 
1. Advanced scripting mode 
2. Advanced checkbox mode
Select Language Help: This will change the language of the programm, you can chose ether English or German.
Sort with Config File Menu Help: In this Menu you can write a configuration of the sorting, see for that Readme.md. You can select a folder the written .json file and then you can sort it as you have it defined.
Sort with Checkboxes Menu Help: In this mode you can checkthe Checkboxes for the Categories that you want to sort and select a folder that you want to sort.
Select Folder Help: If you press this Button you can select the folder that you want to sort.
Select Folder Advanced script Help: If you press this Button you can select the folder that you want to sort.
Select Config File Help: If you press this Button you can select the .json file that you want the config of.
Select Advanced Checkbox Folder Help: If you press this Button you can select the folder that you want to sort.
Sort Simple Help: If you press this button the programm will sort the folder after a good config.
Sort with Config File Help: If you press this button the programm will sort the foilder you selectet after the config file that you have selectet.
Sort with Checkboxes Help: If you press this button the programm will sort the folder that you have selectet, after all Categories you checkt.
Sort Subfolders Help: If you check this Checkbox the programm will sort every subfolder that is in the folder you have selectet else it will ignore those folders.
Checkboxes Help: Here you can check evry Categorie that you like to sort.
